about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: SGH Trasporti is a company based in the province of Parma, specialized in road freight transport. Founded and managed by Sghaier Bacem, we offer reliable transport services both nationally and internationally.
about.story1: SGH Trasporti is a company specialized in road freight transport, based in the province of Parma. Founded and managed by Sghaier Bacem, the company was born with the goal of meeting the growing logistics needs of an increasingly globalized market.
about.story2: Globalization and the increase in online shopping have led to a surge in demand for transport services, especially in e-commerce. With speed, professionalism, and passion for our work, we ensure safe, efficient deliveries that meet every logistical need.
about.story3: Courtesy, availability, and customer satisfaction are the foundation of our business. We provide competitive rates while maintaining high quality standards. We work nationwide and internationally, ensuring punctuality and reliability in every shipment.
about.reliabilityDesc: Punctual deliveries and guaranteed service quality

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete and customized transport solutions for every logistics need. From local shipping to international deliveries.
services.nationalDesc: Freight transport service throughout Italy with fast and secure deliveries. Comprehensive coverage in all regions.
services.internationalDesc: Shipments throughout Europe with complete customs management. Guaranteed door-to-door service.
services.refrigeratedDesc: Temperature-controlled transport for food and pharmaceutical products. ATP certification.
services.oversizedDesc: Transport of bulky or heavy goods with specialized vehicles and escort when necessary.
services.logisticsDesc: Storage, picking, packing and inventory management services to optimize your supply chain.
services.adrDesc: Transport of dangerous goods with ADR certified personnel and vehicles approved according to regulations.
services.needQuoteDesc: Contact us today for a free, no-obligation quote. Our team is ready to assist you.
